LanguageData.AB_PsychotropicFungusHigh.label: psychotropic fungus high
LanguageData.AB_PsychotropicFungusHigh.description: Active psychotropic fungus in the bloodstream. They improve consciousness and decrease the need to rest.
LanguageData.AB_PsychotropicFungusTolerance.label: psychotropic fungus tolerance
LanguageData.AB_PsychotropicFungusTolerance.descripti: A built-up tolerance to psychotropic fungus. The more severe this tolerance is, the more psychotropic fungus it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.AB_PsychotropicFungusAddiction.label: psychotropic fungus addiction
LanguageData.AB_PsychotropicFungusAddiction.descripti: A chemical addiction to psychotropic fungus. Long-term use of psychotropic fungus has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug. \nWithout regular doses of psychotropic fungus, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.AB_RawRimeNodulesHigh.label: raw rime nodules high
LanguageData.AB_RawRimeNodulesHigh.description: Raw rime nodules are filled with a naturally processed propane compound that is mildy euphoric for humans, similar to ethanol. Chemically speaking, this is unlikely, hinting at a non-natural origin for these strange alien flora.
LanguageData.AB_SporesAllergy.label: spores allergy
LanguageData.AB_SporesAllergy.description: This person has developed a strong allergy to the airborne spores present in the Mycotic Jungle. This allergy will make breathing difficult, but it will go away (for now) if treated properly.
LanguageData.AB_SporesAllergy.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.AB_SporesAllergy.stages.1.label: major
LanguageData.AB_SporesAllergy.stages.2.label: extreme
LanguageData.AB_AnimalSporesAllergy.label: spores allergy
LanguageData.AB_AnimalSporesAllergy.description: This animal has developed a strong allergy to the airborne spores present in the Mycotic Jungle. This allergy will make breathing difficult, but it will go away (for now) if treated properly.
LanguageData.AB_AnimalSporesAllergy.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.AB_AnimalSporesAllergy.stages.1.label: major
LanguageData.AB_AnimalSporesAllergy.stages.2.label: extreme
LanguageData.AB_Paralysis.label: neurotoxin paralysis
LanguageData.AB_Paralysis.description: A fast acting toxin is coursing through this creature's veins, paralyzing his muscles. It will wear off after a while.
LanguageData.AB_Paralysis.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.AB_Paralysis.stages.1.label: stunned
LanguageData.AB_Paralysis.stages.2.label: very stunned
LanguageData.AB_Paralysis.stages.3.label: paralysed
LanguageData.AB_SlimeInEyes.label: slime
LanguageData.AB_SlimeInEyes.description: Slime in your eyes blinds you for a while. Also, yuck.
